response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. This product comes with cutting-edge features and unparalleled capabilities that set it apart from competitors. We believe its value extends far beyond its tangible aspects, making it an invaluable asset for any organization looking to gain a competitive edge. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we are offering this exclusive opportunity to acquire it for $15,000. This investment could potentially lead to significant returns and advancements in your business operations. Let's discuss how we can make this valuable addition to your portfolio.", "product_price": 15000}
